title: Nadarbazevi Lake
about: Nadarbazevi lake is located in Shida Kartli region, Gori Municipality, on the north slope of the Kvernaki ridge, at 856 meters above sea level. It is an artificially created reservoir on the site of the former Nadarbazevi Lake. The surface area of the water is 1.18 km, the greatest depth is 1.8 m. Spacious spaces, a blue lake, fields and snow-capped mountains create a beautiful view of the horizon. There is also a forest near the lake, where you can arrange a picnic and relax. This place is perfect for nature lovers. You can also go fishing on Nadarbazevi lake. The lake is very popular in terms of amateur and sport fishing.
